name: Pokétch
description:
Have in your mobile phone the Pokétch. Originally from Sinnoh, it has almost all the functionalities of the original Pokémon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum, like the Clock, the Memo Pad, the Coin Toss and much more. Also, we have added new functionalities like a TicTacToe and a Minesweeper among other things.

Feel free to download it and write what you think about it!

Contributors
  • Christian Martínez De La Rosa (christt105)
  • Víctor Segura Blanco (VictorSegura99)
